entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
